title: 1. Data Types
content:
## Javascript Data Types


### Basic

```js
// Number Data Types

console.log(1)
console.log(23.32)

//  String Data Types

console.log("Double Quotes")
console.log('Single Quotes')

// Boolean Data Types

console.log(true)
console.log(false)

// Null Data Types

console.log(null)
console.log(undefined)


```

### Check Data Type


```js 

const unknown1 = 'foo';
console.log(typeof unknown1); // Output: string

const unknown2 = 10;
console.log(typeof unknown2); // Output: number


const unknown3 = true;
console.log(typeof unknown3); // Output: boolean
```
